While using [[Yamato]] as a medium, [[Tobi (Zetsu)|Tobi]] creates a massive statue, similar to [[Hashirama Senju]]'s [[Sage Art Wood Release: True Several Thousand Hands]] technique. Unlike Hashirama's much larger variant however, this creation does not utilise [[senjutsu]] chakra. The wielder of this avatar is capable of using a [[Top Transformed Buddha|multitude]] of hands to assault their opponents.

Unlike its counterpart, this avatar does not have the [[Wood Release: Wood Human Technique|wood human]] or [[Wood Release: Wood Dragon Technique|dragon]] atop its heads, however, Tobi displayed the ability to channel its ability to [[All is Suffering|manipulate]] all five basic [[nature transformation]]s from the miniature faces that encircle its head.

== Influence ==
In Japan, {{translation|"Kanzeon"|観世音, The one who hears the world}} is a more formal name for the bodhisattva [[wikipedia:Guanyin|Kannon]].

== Trivia ==
* While unnamed in the manga and anime, it was named in ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Blazing]]''.
